attributes.action: Ban the use of fireworks to the public
attributes.additional_details: To ease the call out on emergency services regarding fireworks being let off in residential areas and being used in an unsafe manner.
attributes.background: Ban the use of fireworks to the public. Only allow licensed display teams to purchase them and use them for events. Such as new years, Chinese new year and Diwali

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban the sale of fireworks to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654005
